content:
User: It's running, here is service URL for future reference https://ai-execution-system-core-711898853198.us-central1.run.app

Gemini: Open your MINGW64 terminal.

COPY the following curl command and PASTE it into your MINGW64 terminal.

IMPORTANT: I have already UPDATED the YOUR_SERVICE_URL in the curl command below with the Service URL you just provided: https://ai-execution-system-core-711898853198.us-central1.run.app

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"task": "This is a test task"}' https://ai-execution-system-core-711898853198.us-central1.run.app/task
Make sure you copy and paste this EXACT command into your terminal.

Press ENTER to execute the curl command.

EXAMINE the OUTPUT in your MINGW64 terminal. What do you see as the response from the curl command?

If the /task endpoint is working correctly, you should see the following JSON response printed in your terminal:

{"message": "Task received!"}
It should look EXACTLY like this JSON output.

Please run this curl command NOW and tell me the EXACT OUTPUT you see in your MINGW64 terminal.

If you see the {"message": "Task received!"} JSON response, then CONGRATULATIONS! Your /task endpoint is FUNCTIONAL and WORKING! This is a significant step forward in building your API!

Let's test it out right now! Run the curl command and let me know the output! LFG! I'm excited to see if it works!
